title: A question about division names
body: is it possible to change or even choose you division name if you move between gold and plat or plat and diamond? thought it would be cool to be able to sport a favourite champion etc

replies.body: no thats not an option sorry. It usually places you in the ladder with your freinds so you can compete
bugger thats a shame. really wanted an irelia or twitch division :/

> [{quoted}](name=BladeSensual,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0xPgUrqF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-05T08:04:00.485+0000)
>
> bugger thats a shame. really wanted an irelia or twitch division :/

Go through your friends list for that champ then add the ones in there like all of them and just get demoted then BAM!!
You will automatically change if you move from gold to plat etc. There is no way to choose what name you get, though you are more likely to get placed in one that you have friends in.
